Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.models

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.models.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Ship extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a ship in the Battleship game. Manages the ship's position, type, direction, and state.
See Also:

      public Ship(Ship.Type type)
      Constructs a new Ship instance with the specified type. Randomly assigns a direction to the ship.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the ship
